entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet publish` fails intermittently on macOS with "error code -10" and no additional information #37472
  • Cannot publish to an output folder with commanin the path e.g. "c:\temp\publish .NET6, C#\" #37470
  • `dotnet tool update` skips NuGet package signature verification #37469
  • The "GenerateStaticWebAsssetsPropsFile" task failed unexpectedly #37456
  • dotnet-tools.json: add path to project installed tool #37450

Closed

  • Publish need user to download .NET runtime after upgrading from .NET 7 to 8 #37005

PullRequests

Created

  • Add SkipGetTargetFrameworkProperties to redist.csproj #37471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37466
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--framework` option to restore command #37459
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add -f alias for framework option to list package command #37448
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37335
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #37384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
